textreviewuser: The hotel is clean (new building), has complete aminities with large towels + small towels, can get mineral water and is also available for refilling mineral water in the hallway. There is a kitchenette (common) and a microwave. The location is strategic, behind the hotel is already Jl. Riau and in front of the satay building. Keep it up.

First time stays at this really central located hotel, we booked the Deluxe City View and asked for the high floor to have a better view, it was really a stunning view from the balcony and window. They gave us the room no 1032, its headed to East (just in front of the Gasibu park) and the side window is headed to North (Dago and Mt Tangkuban Perahu view). The room size is just perfect with large modern IPTV and other facilities but the bathroom size is really small (1x1,5) for a 5* hotel, even the 4* hotel have much bigger bathroom. The other issues is the sound proof is really bad, the noise from the busy street and Gasibu park below is clearly heard in the room and its really dissapointing for a 5* hotel. The parking lots is huge, I guess its the biggest basement parking lot for a hotel in Bandung, maybe its because of next to the hotel is a convention center and they shared the same parking lot, and maybe if there's an event at the convention center then parking will be an issue. Anyway, overall its a pleasent stay at the hotel, and really recommended hotel for leissure or business.
The room is clean and the staff were amazing.

Had a very pleasant stay at Pullman Bandung. Got such great complimentary (Room Upgrade, mini bar, and cakes + snacks) because this was our honeymoon stay. Good job Pullman Bandung team especially. Mba Marina, Feby, Dita from Guest Relations Team and the awesome housekeeping team! Will definitely stay here again __
Glad to stay in here. Perfect
Comfy. Spacious. Over all amazing ______

Great service, near to the shopping and cullinary area. Tasty breakfast. Room was clean and tidy, shout out to their housekeeping team! And their guest relations team can provide cute little decoration also. Keep it up, Pullman __
Great location and great room!
Great view. Great room. Will be back soon.
Will definitely come back here again.
Luxury 3 Star Hotel I think, the location very strategic
Great location, nice & helpful staffs, great room & food!
Good services and good facility 's.
Should be better if the lobby placed at ground floor, the breakfast just basic, access to lobby is so confusing up down here there. Design okay, clean and staff friendly.

Nice and new hotel. Request for non smoking room, They give me smoking room, and we complain about the room smell of cigarettes, they said the room was non smoking room. And they prepare some purifier to refresh the room. When we walk to lift, the smoking floor label seen. What a poor staff, they lied about that.

textreviewuser: A pleasant stay in the middle of bandung. I booked the single room with a bathtub (required prior request) and the room exterior feels like an aged homey place. The hot water is available on specific times (5-9; 15-21), the bathtub drain plug is not available (you had to bring/make your own), the air conditioning remote required extra aim to be able to function. The bed was alright, it has one pillow. The exterior is well-maintained, a lot of breathing space and great gardens. This hotel has a "kamartuju" cafe which serves great ristresso and affogato, a must try. On weekend this is a bicycling spot where locals meet up so expect to see them on the cafe at 6-9 am. Didn't book with breakfast so cannot review the restaurant, but had own breakfast in the place and its very cozy. Lots of ventilation and morning breeze. The gate to jl gempol is not opened anymore which is unfortunate, but may be a required thing in these pandemic times. Weekend morning at jl gempol is very crowded nowadays. Overall a nice place for families to stay, would stay again.
propertyinfo: Hotel Bumi Asih Gedung Sate Bandung

They gave us the room no 1032, its headed to East (just in front of the Gasibu park) and the side window is headed to North (Dago and Mt Tangkuban Perahu view). The room size is just perfect with large modern IPTV and other facilities but the bathroom size is really small (1x1,5) for a 5* hotel, even the 4* hotel have much bigger bathroom. Anyway, overall its a pleasent stay at the hotel, and really recommended hotel for leissure or business.
The room is clean and the staff were amazing.

Had a very pleasant stay at Pullman Bandung. Got such great complimentary (Room Upgrade, mini bar, and cakes + snacks) because this was our honeymoon stay. Good job Pullman Bandung team especially. Mba Marina, Feby, Dita from Guest Relations Team and the awesome housekeeping team! Will definitely stay here again __
Glad to stay in here. Perfect
Comfy. Spacious. Over all amazing ______

Great service, near to the shopping and cullinary area. Tasty breakfast. Room was clean and tidy, shout out to their housekeeping team! And their guest relations team can provide cute little decoration also. Keep it up, Pullman __
Great location and great room!

Pros: _ the room & area are very aesthetically pleasing _ good breakfast _ VERY nice bathub experience. Cons: _ VERY moldy. Especially the bedsheet and the bathroom smells very moldy. Could be improve with a proper maintenance. _ VERY noisy. You can hear everything from the room beside and above you. We stayed until 1 AM just to wait all the noises to stop. Would recommend bringing an earplug here. _ the room layout wasn't convenient, though aesthetically pleasing. Putting a clothing rack on top of the bed was surely space saving, but annoying. _ we found an ashtray full of cigarettes and patio floor dirty when we checked in. Proof that they haven't thoroughly cleaned up the room before we got in.
Great location, and nice interior. Had a pleasant staycation, but a lil'bit lack of privacy because of the glass wall. Need some improvement on the sound-proof walls.
Had a pleasent experience stay here. One of the best moment at Bandung.
The room interior is awesome, the staff is very friendly, breakfast is yummy. However, the room is not sound proof, you can still hear the noise from the outside but it is still bearable.

Had a great time staying here. The service is great: quick responses from front desk, bottle water refill, breakfast delivered to your room, room service billed on check out. The bed is comfortable, the bathroom is clean, the room is very well designed. Wifi was spotty during our stay, but it worked well outside the room; Not sure what the problem was. Also the TV (with Netflix, etc) is connected to LAN cable, so this wasn't an issue. The room on the 1st floor is on the same floor as a restaurant (right outside the door) and not soundproof, so it might get a bit loud during busy hours.
Good value and quality to rest and ease up your mind.
The space is rather small, but for a short stay, it 's doable. The best part about it is their location!

The room was okay, but the services are terrible, my wife got bad service, we booked a room with breakfast, but didn't get our breakfast meal, also the staff are not helpful since we brought the baby and my wife had a lot of stuff to bring, the staffs on duty didn't care at all. Such disappointment.
All was OK, nothing special. The bedroom quite less OK.
Clean room and close to the crowd. Had a nice jog with very good weather! Recommended!

The room is dusty and dirty, the hairdryer isn't working, the food is painfully stale, saw the worker clean the table using the same cloth for the floor, they cut off electricity 11.30 (check out is 12.00). Definitely not coming back.
The price is good, yet the cleanliness of the hotel is unsatisfying. The waste water flow of wastafel is really slow too.
No hot water, smelly bed, dirty pillow. Nasty.

Location, location, location.. The hotel is located near Taman Lansia.. It means that on Sunday morning, you will experience that famous "Pasar tumpah" My wife really enjoyed that.. Definitely will be coming back..
Strategic location, good service, food 's okay. AC didn't work properly (always set it on lowest temp) and leaking, so uncomfortable. Also, a lots of ants in my room.
Clean, good ambience, stategist.
Clean and good services. Thank you.
Staying at Amaris is never failed. Good service, good room, good location also. Thanks for the warm and friendly staff of Amaris Cimanuk.
This is a very good value for money hotel for us. Room, service, staff and location is __.
Great stay. I worked at government office nearby and had event for 3 days. I decided to stay at amaris. It is nice for only take a rest. The staff were also nice
Staffs very friendly, good food.
Room as per expectation, clean and tidy price also better via app
more than enough. location is very good
Check in for 2 deluxe room at 4PM but not ready for 1 room. Need to reminder couple times for our 2nd room and got at 5PM.
I had a time and it was so memorable, definitely will come back to this hotel.
Will be back again gor next trip.
Nice hotel clean and comfy. The Location was great near to many Cafe and restaurant. Great for family stay.

We arrived at the hotel at 3.30 pm expecting the rooms would be ready. However, the rooms were not ready. And when we asked for late check out as the compensation, they refused it. For me, it is so unfair. We are asked to fulfill the obligation, but they are not giving us our rights. Second disappointment was we need to retrieve our welcome drinks at the 12th floor (I think it ' s a lounge or something). We were tired and we don't have the energy to swing by the lounge just to get our drinks. Third, the parking lot was very very inadequate for a 4 star hotel. However, the food were quite tasty and the staffs at the restaurant and cafe were super nice and helpful.

We were a 10 person family group that stayed over the weekend to celebrate my mom's birthday. It was a pleasant stay at De Paviljoen Bandung. Strategic location, all staffs were friendly and helpful (all of them!), rooms were clean, good facilities and the covid19 health protocols were applied in good manner as well. Breakfast menu and taste were also very good! I got a complimentary Birthday Cake surprise on our breakfast, it was a very pleasant experience stayed there, will be back again! - Please keep up the good work De Paviljoen!
This hotel breakfast very dellicous __.
Second time back here, choose this hotel because there is the room with 2 bedrooms. It's quite rare to find a hotel, service is usually really nice, our favorite to stay so far.
Spacious bathroom, near the mosque and nice culinary around hotel.
Good, clean and easy to find and so close to food restaurant atound hotel.
I love the ambience of the surroundings.

Staff is very friendly, 4 days, they always cleaned up my rent room, but still so much baby cockroaches, and its supposed single bed room type but changed to double bed very weird, only make room more smaller also, and the price of beverages (ice bottle drink) change every staff, once IDR 8000 and next is IDR 10000 difference time is night and morning, also bathroom too small. Oh yeah my room is 317. Because last time I stayed at this hotel is perfect in 2nd floor. In 3rd floor not so much.

A lot of baby cockroach in bathroom. No linen cover for bolster. I will think twice to stay again in this hotel. I think with the same price offered by them, I can get better service in other hotel. Understand that their location is in the city center, but doesn't mean they are lowering the quality because they offer cheap price. Cleanlinness should be priority for hotel industry.
Amazing place to have a great time for a simple trip. Thanks btw. It 's nice to be here __.
Very nice place, strategic location and good staff!

Honestly it was great for a short gateway place, but it 's sad that after the night out my skin was red and all itchy and I think it 's because the bed was not properly cleaned and taken care of. The atmosphere is rather eerie especially at night.
Location is good. But I got room with broken flush and bad smelled bathroom.
Near to city excitement, comfortable and spacious.

The first room I entered reeked of cigarette smoke, although it was supposed to be non-smoking room. Thee staff was nice and let me trade rooms. However, it was a very noisy place at night. People smoked cigarettes in the hallways and sometimes in the rooms. Will not stay here again.
had a pleasant staying here, love the common space. it was too crowded maybe because it was Saturday night. but overall, this was okay.

I do love staying at this place as I feel homy. The atmosphere is very nice and cozy. The room is very nice for all of us. The hotel staffs are very friendly but the phone line is not working. Keep upgrade the services. Good Luck and all the best.
The hotel facilty was OK but the staff was not friendly at all. The room was not that clean. Very unstatisfied.
Reasonable price and near from front office and other some Bandung cullinary places.
Very very strategic location, clean room, and good vibes!
Good place to stay, better if you earn the parking lot

My friend & I were a bit surprised to see that there is no refrigerator inside the room. But other like mineral water & toiletries are all there. So; I guess is okay. My friend ask for 1 extra pillow and they were okay with that. We got our request to have non smoking room & high floor.
Good Location and fast chek in.
Guest hoeusenya serem.
great location near gedung sate, you can also walk around jalan Riau for food and shopping.

Been stay there for one night, overall good but the sheets is full of dust, they not change the sheets for so long. Also we found a cockroach in front of toilet, a bit much mosquito. Service was awesome. Owner very friendly and welcoming
Nice environment. Nice place, nice service
The rooms are neat, clean, hot water facilities are also available, quite comfortable, and definitely a very affordable price! Thank God, thank you
Strategic location, quiet, clean, friendly. Recommended.
Clean and neat, only the hot water is long out.
Car parking space is limited, some must park on the roadside
The place is clean, cool atmosphere, suitable for a break after tired of working. Standard according to price.
All good, I am glad because of its location in the middle of the city also room service facility is enough for us the newcomers.
Spend two days here with family and everything was good. Everyone here were helpful and kind. Thank you…

I request for new clean sheet&linens, but upon arrival lots of stain on the tired linens, I ask for change after 2 times, I just setlle. Check in at 3 pm waiting on the no lights no AC no ventilized lobby hotel its the worst experienced. We decline the buffet breakfast, upon hearing that guest freely access themself with plastic glove. Its a big no no on pandemic era like today. We had a good experienced with free shutlle to train station & when my son accidently lock himself outside the room, they quickly resolve the matter, good job. Location is very centered. Its is the 9.2 rating was also questionable. All and all the CHSE sertificate is questionable. Dirty floor on my room are not tolarable at all. We will try other establishment.
Very friendly and polite staff and very clean room also very good food.

This is my 2nd time staying here and I got free upgrade to Executive room. The staff are helpful and friendly in many ways. We appreciate your kindness during this difficult time. Foods are fine, I love your grilled ribs. Btw the minus are I ordered sunny side up to replace the omelette this morning but I only got 1 egg and no sausage. The cook (I think she is a trainee) didn't even bothered to give it. It ' s okay, she has long way to learn by experience. And for the FB team, please ensure your cutlery like fork is not bent when you provide them to guests. I got them twice for my room service. Anyway, thank you for the pleasant stay we had. We will surely come back again next time.
Liked it and Loved it. Liked it and Loved it.
Love the place, really prefect spot if you want to go to everywhere in bandung, nearby food court in evening, gym tool complete and swimming pool really clean and nice
Comfort hotel, clean and friendly
Very strategic place, clean room.

Good B&B hotel with good services. The good: nice location, helpful customer services, neat rooms. Things to be considered: Parking space, its small compared to guest capacity, but the security are very nice and helpful with it. Things can be improved: Wall paint are a bit spotted from older paint. Also attention to detail on amenities (frayed towel and shower doors hinges) and cleanliness (some dust spots). But nothing major, and a quick wipe and replacement fixed them. Definitely in my shortlist for future visits.
Got some problems with the room but the reception did a good job, thank you ____.
The comfort place to stay for business or family traveling.
Hospitality is great, breakfast is good, clean room, nice water pressure and hot water, pretty limited parking space but the security and valet is awesome.

The staffs are super nice and compliant to health protocols. They are so helpful and willing to do extra miles. The room is superb, the view is amazing, the food tasted so good. The hotel is situated in such a strategic location where customers just can reach so many favorite places in Bandung with no hassle. Deifinitely recommended!
AC is hot, dirty bathroom and super dirty balcony.
Room OK clean and nice but breakfast not really good about the refill suplies the food always empty.

The room just as same as the picture. The service is good. Breakfast is just OK. Clean room, AC & water heater works well. Slippers & Amenities was nice. The only problem is you can hear the sounds from other guests from other room. And the sounds from street. Other than that, everything is good.
Strategic location, good ambience, comfy place.

Plus + +Strategic Location in City Centre +Cozy Room +A Loot of Trees & Greenery +Nice Hotel Staff +Good Food available Restaurant and coffee shoop in Ground Floor Minus - -Sound From the street sometimes Noisy until 6 floor -Parking Loot to small and difficult for parking -Wifi to slow sometimes disconnected -need more maintenance in bathroom -the air conditioner sometimes not working well

Nice room and location, only one thing: the hotel cleaning team forgot to take bath towel that been using by the previous guest, also no second room key card provided. Kopi-O downstairs is nice with outdoor and indoor seating. Would like to come again.

Comfy accommodation at the center of Bandung City. Easy access, near to the "Gedung Sate". Warm and homey design of the building. Therefore, the bed is quite small. I had a twin bedroom. Overall, everything is good.
Great location, have many eateries around the hotel, small parking space, clean room, nice furm beds.

The place is nice and clean. Stay at the 4persons room, it's quite spacious. The hotel have nice photo spot and have nice theme. The foods are really good! The workers are nice and helpful. The hotel also near lots of cafe and shopping mall.

It was always great. Quiet, clean, great Wi-Fi, and very supportive staff. I'm just hoping the management will increase the voltage capacity in each room so I won't have to keep asking the staff to turn the power back on every time it 's dead due to my using a laptop for work in the room. And no, I never use altogether with a phone charger. The funny thing is it has never happened when I stayed at Bobobox Paskal.

Superb! Clean, hightech, cheap (under IDR 200k), friendly staff, good facilities: wifi, hot water, water dispenser, microwave, prayer room. Althought there's silence hours (21.00-07.00) still I could hear voices. So, you might need to have ear plugs especially for those you are too sensitive to voices. But, I love the idea of natural sound effect and light setting based on our mood on our capsule. Brilliant. Just, a suggestion for those who have problem with weight and steps, you'd better book the earth type not the sky one. Over all, a great experience and would love to come back.
Nice pods I've ever seen ____ highly recommended ____.

Cleanliness was undoubtedly great: from the lobby, the pods corridor, to the shared bathroom all were very clean. A perfect place for a backpacker or those who are on a short vacay and looking for a place to stay: preferrably 1 to 3 nights.
Good, clean, strategic location.
Clean, facilities (toilet, pantry, etc) are cleaned regularly. Strategic place.

I had high expectations with Bobobox, and let me tell you this: Bobobox DID meet my expectations! I am very pleased with my stay. Never have I ever thought that sleeping in a private, secluded box would make me feel that refreshed and relaxed. I was grateful that I booked the double sky pod all for myself though, it was spacious for someone with a small figure like I am. I love how cold the pod was and how comfortable the bed was. Since I booked the sky one, it kind of made me feel a little bit adventurous, which I enjoyed. The bathroom was clean and thankfully not that far away from my pod. The warm water just hit different when I took a bath in the cold morning of Bandung. The communal space was okay, not that crowded and packed with people-again, which I enjoyed. So, the conclusion is: I am definitely going back. Sooner than I think I will, I guess. Thank you, Bobobox <3.
This place is so good, clean, and cute. I am highly recommended to my friends for stay in Bobobox.
Great place to stay, very calm and quite.
The only thing lacking is that the bed was not comfy and so hard. But the rest, AMAZING.

It 's a quite decent 2 star hotel. The building is well managed and clean. However they need to improve on 2 things. First, their AC, during my stay, my room AC didn't work well and it felt hot inside the room (+ they don't have another ventilation except their see-through window). Second, the WIFI, signal was there but still can't access the internet. Overall it was a nice stay with Flores Gallery Hotel. Definitely will be back with hope of improvement.
The atmosphere was bad because there is lack of cleanliness and air freshener so I can’t enjoy it.
Super clean and comfy room. The bathroom also clean and pretty large. However, mineral water or coffee is not available
Staff was so polite and helpful. Better stay at 3rd floor than 2nd floor, because the wifi was stronger there.
Breakfast not normally, very limited.
Staying with parents with one bed room, one queen bed and one single bed. Mom was impressed with the room. Great location to stay for a while. Culinary and some park was walking distance!

Checkin late in the afternoon. The room was ready but quit small for a family Clean The Hot Shower took around 5 minutes Kinda waste water while waiting for the hot water to come out In a alley side of the main road so the ambience quite
Room very clean & comfy but internet very bad.

The location is strategic, since it is small hotel so there is no facility like swimming pool, etc. The room is clean except for the shower above our head looks like there is a fungus, I suggest to clean the fungus regularly. Lift location is so guest friendly, from parking lot we can go to our room floor so we don't have to carry the luggage to the lobby. We have to choose breakfast when we check in, so we don't have many option and the portion is already set by the hotel. The choice is"nasi kuning"which maybe not everyone like"nasi kuning". Overall the hotel is OK but I think the price better is reduce since there is no facility and guest is only use the room for sleep.
This my 2nd time staying here and always satisfied with their service! Good job!

Wifi connection is poor, no staff can be asked for help, they said there ' s only one person who standby at front office, padahal weekend. Already ordered breakfast night before and confirmed that they can help us to bring the breakfast to our room, but we have to get it ourselves in the restaurant. The pillows are hard, which uncomfortable.
Room is not too big, but Great hospitality! Staff were really responsive if we need something. Location is perfect. Great value for money
The room dirty, the pillow and bed dirty too, AC not cool there is need a maintenance.

Very strategic location, but it's an old, smelly, and creepy hotel and the room as well, dirty bed sheets and pillow cases (not sure if it's cleaned or disinfected), dusty window sills, poor water stream from the shower, limited-time hot water, no exhaust in the bathroom, I had to ask for mineral water (not provided in the room), room facilities such as decorative lighting not working, only 1 available power outlet for charging, no toiletries, smelly bathroom, not well-trained receptionist (most of them are middle-aged men and obviously not a hospitality person). I finally had to upgrade the room to a bigger one in the GF (per night is IDR 250k) as 2nd floor is too creepy. My description above is for the bigger room, so can you imagine the one that I originally ordered… cheaper and creepier. The room irl is not as shown in the profile. Will never stay here no more unless they renovate the hotel.
The hotel is in a dirty condition, cigarette ash everywhere. The bathroom looks like it hasn't been cleaned in a long time. And smelly room.
The worst hotel in the world. Dirty room, noisy air conditioner, bad service. Superbad experience.
But no toiletries, broken AC :(

To be honest the location is perfect. maybe it is an old hotel so they keep it that way, I find the room is clean but there is dust in the corner of windows, cupboard, desk, bedhead. Just small dust not really bother me. it is all from me.

The room is rather smelly, perhaps it is a bit humid. The closet is broken, the water does not automatically stop after I flush the toilet. The utilities in the bathroom or bedroom are old, some are not working. But the room is clean, and the receptionist is friendly. The location of the hotel is strategic (in Dago).
Great place to stay in Bandung

All the stafs are really friendly and helpful. The things that dispointed us are the room is smells of smoke. The lamps switch is broke, the air conditioning setting also broke, the wadrobe door can't close. And the important things, when I go outside and want to come back to our rooms, the door couldn't open. And finally after all this complaints they change our rooms. Not big as before room, at least its not smell bad. But for the door it happened again, after we go outside we can't open it again until we call the receptionist. I hope they do good maintenance for their rooms. Because the location is good, food is good, the rooms is large, the view are great, just need little attention in maintenance. Thank you.
The room was spacious enough. Cleanliness was OK, staffs are very helpful and the hotel managed the health protocols very well.

The staffs are nice but the service is bad. The room is not clean, it ' s dusty and the furnitures are badly maintained. The housekeeping only replaced the the bad sheets, they didn't even clean the room nor bathroom. The AC was not working properly, we had hard time sleeping. Asked them to fix the AC but they did little to nothing. Breakfast was so so. Little parking space. Covid protocol was terrible, most of the guests did not wear any mask in lobby and restaurant. Sad sad stay. We actually booked for Two nights, but only stayed for one, got the second night refunded and moved to a better hotel. It ' s very unfortunate because this hotel used to be very Good. Used to stay here few years ago and it was very pleasing, but not this time. Sad to see what happened to this hotel. In 2016/17 the room here used to cost around $ 70-$100/night now it only costs $ 35, half the price. Judging by that I can clearly say it ' s because of the degradation of quality. Maybe because of pandemic? We'll never know. If you want a pleasant stay for/under $ 50, I suggest look for newer modern hotels to stay like Moxy hotel, hotel 101 or any other budget hotel. They cost almost the same and offer better room and services. Hope this help. Cheers!
Everything was good, however breakfast menu selection could be better.
This hotel good location. But the rooms smell smoking, and parking area is too small.
Its a old run down property, with many areas broken within the room. The photos of the property & its facilities are not in sync to the reality.
The staffs are very friendly and helpful. The price definitely worth the comfort and the facilities provided. Kind of wish the AC can be a bit colder though. All in all, it was a very pleasant stay.
Clean, cozy, good service, strategic location.
Variasi makanan saat breakfast kurang. Overall we enjoy the hotel. Will be back for sure.
Nice and clean room. Excellent service.
For location it was strategic enough, even little bit far from convenient store. staff in hotel was very nice, but for the room condition was not so satisfying
the bathroom door could not closed... small room was not good...hope just once I am there
Mosquitoes! I think that one word is more than enough.
Old hotel, no good maintenance and I am sorry to say but this is for the improvement to their management. ______

Sorry to say despite of the strategic location, the hotel is not well maintained. After using the bathroom, the door lock was fell off and cannot be opened from outside. We have to move to the other room. Aircon have no remote for selecting temperature, only on and off switch. Iit will be our last alternative for staying in Bandung

it's an old hotel. quite mystic atmosphere + : check in is easy no mosquito aircon works well hot water works well the staffs are awesome 12.30 check out the breakfast is plenty what can be better: - sign board to let you know where is dequr. because if your not local, even if your local.. there is a garden in front which make it complicated to reach. - could you provide more shampoo or soap, when I was there, it's only 2 little bar of soap. - bottle water small one is enough,rather you put water in the cup. I'm concerned about hygiene. - some chilly in breakfast because quite plain
Good for family. Nice environment.

The location is great but the hotel is dirty, spooky and so unfriendly. When I come to the hotel, at the front door is not clean and a lot of red ants spreading. In the room, the sheet is so...yellowish. the bath room so dusty.

The great thing about this Hotel is location, it is near the famous landmark and city attraction, that you can reach by foot. The only downside that it is old Hotel and not well maintained you can find dust in some corner. But other then that it's awesome
Dirty room, dirty and smelly bed and pillow, limited hot water for bath (only in the morning), this hotel is too expensive for very poor services
Got cake and fruit as welcoming, friendly staff, awesom whirlpool

We were stay here 3 times before pandemic. Now we back again but got shocked cause its way different from before. They have lowered the quality. It too dark for 4 stars hotel, they put us on 2snd building. No body stand by at the lobby.

Luxton provides very poor parking lot in front of (outdoor) Hotel site because the indoor parking lot is fully occupied. Very unsatisfying because after I parked my car at outdoor parking lot my car is fully with insect (ant) until today I have to clean up my car regularly. Please provide a nicely parking lot and always think about any risks when you provide outdoor parking lot! I give 1 point out of 5 for facilities in Luxton Specifically for the parking lot.
Specious room, clean, friendly staff, nice breakfast, good location, two thumbs-up!
Friendly staffs, clean and spacious room, good food. Will definitely go back for my next trip.

Booked family room for my cousin ' engagement party there. The bed and room were clean and spacious. The staffs were very helpful and friendly. The food? You must try the ice cream! Location is great too.
Simple. Central city. Affordable
The services are always great even though we only got 1 night stay because all the guest house booked for wedding event. Reminds me to my grandma house back then
All facilities are good and work as intended to be. All staff is friendly and helpful. Very nice.
clean and comfort. The bedroom is big enough for 3 persons to stay. Hotel staff are nice, helpful and friendly.

The room was clean, spacious, and comfy. But brighter lights would be nice, though. Generally, I love the interiors and the ambience of the house, typically beautiful Bandung old soul. The staffs and services were wonderful, thank you. But please have a little improvement on the food taste. Great location at the heart of the city, surrounded with street foods and restaurants.
Nice guest house. Reccomended if you travel with family
The room are really difrerent with the photos. And too dusty even there is a renovation but still in room supposed to be clean.
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)
OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: Very disappointed! There is no receptionist looking after, bad service. No toiletries. The bathroom smells and the water doesn't turn on. Sorry horror!
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: Very disappointing, the receptionist is not friendly, the air conditioner is noisy, sandals, water heater, coffee tea, no toothpaste, no toothbrush, the air conditioner is not cold, the bathroom is transparent, the architectural arrangement is not neat, the toilet floor and the room are flat so the water runs out all wet the floor of the room, the curtains are broken and dusty, the lighting arrangement is not bright enough. The point is not recommended for those from outside the city.
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: Very good service. Even though the check-in is at dawn. But the team is still friendly and alert. Even cooler after checking out 1 hour from the hotel. You got a notification by wa from the management. He said something was missing. Cool out. Recommended.
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: For whatever reason, the hotel is scary, the electricity often goes out, the building is ancient, the signal is difficult, check in at 3 pm, check out at 9 pm because I don't dare to sleep, there are no tissues, soap, shampoo, toothbrush.
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: The place is spacious, the service is very friendly, the security is very tight, the prices for street vendors are really, very recommended

textreviewuser: The room doesn't match the photo of the basic dusty floor cupboard, it's really bad.
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: A place to stay with a different atmosphere, thank you.
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: Friendly service, spacious rooms, need anything to help, really good receptionist.
propertyinfo: OYO 90479 The Ethnic Hotel Bandung (all Suites)

textreviewuser: De Riau Cottage wasn't exactly as expected as the rooms are all separated from each other.
The owner is very friendly and understanding.
Because access to the room is rather complicated open the closing of the actual gate for the safety factor also
Clean and tidy, the owners are friendly. There is a shared kitchen

Located in Bandung major neighborhood, so location was great. The room was spacious, clean and pretty comfy. The staffs were helpful and friendly. A little downside: you should bring your own amenities, especially shampoo & conditioner. Overall it was a pleasant stay.
So clean, good service and I love stay here. Going to be back!
Clean and comfort all staff are friendly.
Very enjoy staying here. Nice service, very attentive to guests, and gorgeous place to take pictures with. Wonderful moments
It is a strategic place in the center of Bandung. The accommodation is good and the service is great.
Recepsionist staff is nice, housekeeping and engineering not so good. Parking space is so small. The room is equal with the money you spend.
It was okay. Perfect location for shopping.
Good hotel, room space is ample for the price, conveniently located around shopping outlets. Breakfast could be better though
perfecto... with low price we can get higher. recommended
more than just perfect for 3 stars hotel. great in hospitality, meals, room, hot water, excellent service. highly recommended! I will come again !
Wifi is not good & Breakfast is standard
Fit the price, nice location, clean room.

for room no issues, but you maybe more put attention to breakfast. I mean for tasty and readiness the food. as long as I stayed, the food is cold and always empty. need long time for refuel-ling it again
Excellent, comfort, nearby everywhere.
Cockroach in the bathroom. Bathroom needs more clraning since it looks worn out and smelly. But room is okay.
Recommended hotel in middle of the city.
Not bad lah. For budget stay! Stay clean please.

To be frank I pick the most cheaper hotel because I am a budget friendly person at that time and then I found this hotel and just randomly pick this hotel and unexpectedly turns out this hotel is really good & comfortable. Like I would go to this hotel for the second time because it 's cheap and they have a great room service and I hope they will keep improving in their service and the room and everything but over all I will give it a 5. Thanks!
Awesome staff, nice place, definitely gonna come back there, thanks.
Bed sheet smell bad. Dirty bathroom.
One of favorites accommodation when I'm in Bandung. Great location. Reasonable rate. Good services. Quite spacy room which meets the rate. Highly recommended.

Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice. Thanks (B2K)
its peaceful place to relax and secure
Very nice and friendly staff.
The food was delicious. Room was clean and hotel have a great view at the top floor. I am very enjoyed it. Thank you.
Nice! An so affordable! The room is spacious ____.
Location is city center, service is good, recommended when you in Bandung.
Location in middle of city, nice place, service is OK.
Location in middle of city, good place, service was OK.

worst experience. really not worthed the money. the staffs are friendly. it has nice public space. the good : the room are spacious. properly maintained the bad : very limited parking spot. but the valet is free. the key is manual one pillow per person. for a 600k room, disappointing. the ugly: the elevator is down. I ordered hotel with an elevator because of my handicap, yet this hotel force me to walk on stairs. :( because I arrived late at night, I have no choice but to continue. the staff is very helpful though. they help all the baggage to the room. the air conditioner are damp, so it smells the bedroom and bathroom is not clean enough for the price :( need much work to raise the standard. specially after two years pandemic
Worst experience of stay ever. You pay peanut you get monkey. Don't expect too much
Water heater not working.

Standar hotel. Clean enough but No water heater, no curtain on the batrhroom, you need to ask to receptionist if you need towel. No toileters so you better brought it for yourself. But it worth the price.
It 's not that good. The shower in our room has less water. Seriously uncomfortable. I tried to call the operator 3 times but no answer. Not responsive. Never come to this hotel again.
Having staycation here for 2 night and really enjoyed. We'll be back to stay! Thanks.
Good service, meet expectation hotel for staycation, but the breakfast is not recommended.
It was great. The room was clean, the bed was comfortable, the staffs were very helpful. Strategic location. Nice breakfast. Will definitely book the room again in the future.

I'm very disappointed because of my ordered is deluxe queen but in fact I have got twin bed that modified like queen bed (1 bed) and there is not information to me before. I realized when I woke up in the morning. Breakfast has not variety
Breakfast food was really bad most of them too salty and not fresh.
The room is hot, the food is poor.
Old hotel. Take too long for checking in, waste nearly 45 minute to get the room ready. Room was spacious but dirty.
Room just renovated, breakfast is excellent.
Thank you for the great hospitality.
The bed was so lousy. Too soft, sleeping like drowning in the water. Hotel room quite nice after renovation.
The parking lot is too small for 4star hotel and so narrow.
Modern furniture, marriot standard same as other courtyard, full breakfast, really enjoy stay at couryard as a part of marriot company.
The room is OK, breakfast awesome.

Hotel is old and not cheap. I order most expensive room available on app, but I got really bad room. I ask non smoking but the room has strong smell of smoke! The view was crappy! A telco tower! Overall, I would not come back and would not recommend.

I heard great reviews from my friend about this hotel. But to be honest, it doesn't live up to the expectations. The place has pretty cool exterior & interior, the location is right in the middle of the city, great environment, the lobby and restaurant area was great. Tried their buffet breakfast and it was pretty good. Their services is also good. What annoyed me a bit was their facilities. I asked for a smoking room, but there was no ashtray inside the room. Their TV program and wifi also disappointing, wifi was slow, troubled TV channels. The room was not as clean. Also, we have to ask for the slippers. Other than that it was okay. They have a lot of potential, I hope they could improve where they were lacking. Thank you Namin.
It used to be a good hotel, but now the building seems not in a good shape, the wall are faded, the shower was broken, maybe need some maintenance to give a good and pleasant stay.
We stayed here for 2 days with a big room and my kids so happy for that. My feedback please improve the cleanliness of the sofa and bed linen, overall happy to stayed here. Thank you.

Upgrading my room from ' simple room ' to ' good room ' but seriously, they have to improve (or repair) their room (a big improvement I think) since the condition of the room especially the ceiling is really bad. In terms of cleanliness, I think the bedcover and the couch also need to be repaired given the condition of such are very dull and there are stains everywhere. In this pandemic circumstances, it is very unfortunate for guests to experience something like this. Apart from the above, the staff is very helpful and hospitable. This hotel also serves a nice breakfast.

Honestly photos can be so deceiving. I didn't think the hotel is worth the star rating and money paid given the condition of my room. I'm just speechless. Didn't ask for room change since I arrived very late about 10-11 pm after driving from Sby. Already waited outside to sterilize my room with my UV lamp and came inside the room to finally notice how dirty it was. Too exhausted to wait for another room change. Staff mentioned maintenance is done every month but the clogged drain in the shower, broken lights (kept flashing during the night) and everything else just couldn't lie.

I like the place actually. But to be honest I was surprised that AC was not provided and the lady who welcomed us did not really answer my general questions. I was glad they provide beds for our driver. But the room was unique, the paddy field view was beautiful, and there are so many spots to just sit and relax. The weather was a bit hot during the day and started to cool off in the evening.

The odor was not good more like an old room, there were also some stains on the couch but fortunately, the linen was quite clean. In addition, the bathroom did not seem to be regularly cleaned as there were some yellowish spot on the wall near the shower

I really enjoyed stay here for a night, the breakfast is the best! Has many variations food menu, the room comfy and AC cold also I got my room view facing to the mountain, it was cool! I'll come back again soon! Hehehe thank you Aryaduta Bdg!
Love this hotel, I had pleasant experience, comfortable and clean
Room is comfy and clean, the service are great. Does not feel like old place since the room ambiance are timeless and classic and cleaned properly. View from the room also nice.
The bathroom always left a puddle of water due to sloping floor.
Not convenient parkir spot for hotel guess.

This is a hotel with the best design I've ever seen. Great combination of functionality and aesthetics. I appreciate how optimally they've allocated the space available in the hotel into different rooms/functions. It's brilliantly proportional; Not too much, not too little, just exactly the right proportion of everything. Amazing food, amazing view, and since it's in Bandung, amazing weather, too. Will definitely come back here sometime soon.

The check-in process was horrible. It should be at 2pm but we entered the room at 4:30 pm because the room was not ready. The queue was very long also, they made us enjoy coffee break to wait but there were too many people. Not to mention the wet floor in the bathroom in my room. This was the first time I experienced such bad check in time. Too bad, the facilities were good tho.
A very nice and clean hotel with excellent services, the food was also very good. The location is also perfect for my family.

Very satisfied staying at this place. The staff was very helpful, the breakfast was delicious, the location quite strategic. 3 star guest house but worth of 4 star hotel. Looking forward to stay at this place again.
This hotel is awesome, they provide delicious breakfast. The only thing I disliked is the wifi, extremely poor connection.

Love the cozy and homey vibes of this inn. The place is very clean, and interior is lovely; It gives you that home feeling with simple design. They have books on the shelves in public area, and the location is in the corner of a small street so It is nice and quiet. You only have to walk through a couple of small streets to reach the main road which is at the heart of Bandung. Very recommended.

I really love this Inn, for sure! So comfy, clean, homey, minimalist, aesthetic, and helpful staff. Good and strategic location. They have simple food menu for breakfast and room service but taste good. Definitely will come back for my next holiday. Thank you:).
Clean, nice decoration, great breakfast, friendly staffs! Well done.

We were traveling for business meeting, so instead of meeting outside the hotel, we decided to have it at Saninten Inn. They have cozy open air lounge, very delicious food, and best coffee according to us and our business partner. The room was comfy and super clean, staff are helpful and the owners are amazing, they made coffee for us! Thank you and keep up the good work Saninten Inn. Definitely we will stay here again.
Really recommended. The room was really comfortable.
Great location and design. Super clean
homey.. clean.. quiet atmosphere...not too hectic...preferred to choose while stay in bandung
Clean bedroom & bathroom, has water heater, so kind reseptionist, antique vibe, comfortable.
strategic location, great service, & feels like home. Gonna stay here again, soon. bravo__
Spacious, comfy and super clean!

The location is quiet, strategic, and clean. The waiter was very friendly. The inn is also clean, homey, the facilities are complete, and comfortable. Suitable for a vacation with family or a place to rest after a meeting in Bandung.

The first time I stayed here, I was hesitant at first because there were no reviews yet, even though this is a good position in the middle of being delicious everywhere, and it turns out that it's really nice to stay here, hot water is smooth, getting a room is a bit cramped, it's difficult to pray because the bed is king, comfortable sleep, the receptionist is friendly. Anyway, if you go to Bandung, stay here again.
Very comfortable. That represents my experience here.
Alhamdulillah, it's very satisfying to stay here.
Clean and comfortable feels like home. The staff is very friendly. The facilities are also okay.
The rooms are clean and the service is friendly.
Nice really clean. The guard is very friendly. Wifi to the room.
Good place, but got no phone signal and the wifi sucks. I even had difficulty posting this review.
So so dirty! All staffs not wearing mask!
Strategic location, nice service, clean, worth it! Its written room only, but we got mineral waters hehehe. Thankyou~ it wuold be better if theres warm water~.

Air conditioner is not working, ripped towel, and the colour is gray instead of white (the bed cover too!!) the toilet (flush) water look like full of mud. very bad in the morning really bad because the neighbor and clerk really noisy having conversation!!
clean room, nice front desk team. good for backpackers.
The toilet not tidy, clean and smelly. And the room so much ant. But so far so good

Never stay here again. Stayed for 4 nights, first night went smooth and was a nice experience although it's not very clean, the rest quickly becoming nightmare full of regrets. Suddenly there's we heard buzzing sound that coming from unknown source, it was so noisy and make it very uncomfortable to stay. Told the staff three times but no action was done, not even a good hopeful answer was given.
The location is good. Hotel didn't provide towel. Tidiness was poor. Receptionist was very helpful.
Great experience staying with kids, the pool is exceptional.
Very clean and coomfy hotel, great view swimming pool at night.
Have a good experience stay here. Staffs are kind and helpful.
Best Location, clean and good mantain. Comfortable room and nice staff.
Good Hotel, Good Staff, Clean, comfortable … __ love.
Nice room, great services. So far was good.
I had a good pleasant stay here, it 's very cozy place. Recommend for the next stay here.
The service was satisfying. The staff was helpful and nice. The breakfast was OK too. Overall, we had pleasant stay.

We stay for 1 night. Check in process was poor. We've waited at least 1 hour before enter the room. Parking lot was too small, Lighting in our room was not comfortable at all. Every light was connected in master switch, we couldn't one by one to on or off each light.

Definitely would stay here again. Lovely design, cosy. Unfortunately due to the Covid-19 protocol, entrance is through basement, but good to know they take safe protocols. Very good location to walk from to nice cafes, and shops. Love the hotel design and service is really good-asked the restaurant to borrow some plates and bowls and they happily lent us. We stayed two nights and definitely a wonderful stay.
Location is strategic. Clean and comfy room! Also friendly and helpful staff! Thank you.
Good service.

The hotel is near to famous Dago (about 5mins walking) but located in very calm area. It’s easy to be reached by many kinds of transportations (taxi, angkot, online vehicles). The design brings back to the Dutch architecture era (but some of equipments in the room little bit rusty). There is also a coffee shop which serves amazing coffees with affordable price.
It’s good & nice hotel with affordable price
Kind staff, good food, room is ok.

The room is comfortable but the soaps and shampoo were not refilled. The towels looked dirty. Had to ask for extra toilet paper. The breakfast was cold, juice dispenser was not working, no one was around to ask for assistance in the cafe. Housekeeping staff were friendly and prompt when asked.
Nice trip nice hotel. We are nice pleasure to stay here.

This is above an average for budget hotel. What I love is they have a good air circulation (balcony door can be opened to get some fresh air). Though the furniture may be some old and stain with smoke burn but overall room was clean. Compared to budget hotel with same price, this hotel is excellent. Wifi works well, naerby to city centre and only few steps to get a good coffee. Minus = I don't see amenities like electrical teapot with coffee and tea in my room.
This Hotel has potential. Need to maintain room detailing and facility. You can spot a little frog near the fish pool. I am okay with that :). Just FYI for those who scare of frogs.
Cozy but old furniture, need a little renovation.
The lobby and parking spot smell bad (I guess there was a pile of trash). The bathroom is dirty, I didn't mind if it's old but there were stains everywhere. And the shower was kind of broken.
Good service!!! Love the interior and exterior as well____
Everything was smooth, room clean and wifi works well. However, AC in our room was noisy and it's really annoy us
Had the most pleasant stay here. Corsica is kinda like my second bedroom. Lol
clean and comfy if you don't mind with the noise.
Nice room, good location, recommend for business trip.
my favorite hotel ever. always enjoy being there.
Nice bedroom and good facilities. Good place for low budget. I only spend less than IDR 300.000 per night for standard room. I got free breakfast and WIFI.
Fine place to stay short. Breakfast ok, room ok.

It was great, the price is okay compared with that we get. The room has refrigerator and water heater, the shower works well. Ac also great but the remote doesn't work well because the battery is low. Also the room is not really clean, having a bit dusty feeling and if you pay attention to some floor in corner of the room under curtain it's a bit unclean. Also witnessing some worker smoked while cleaning other room when we checked out.
When I visited Bandung, I always stay here. The service is good, the staffs are nice and kind, the food is delicious too. No doubt.
Just a typical place to stay, choose the room wisely. If you want a better room, then choose room on 3rd floor __.

All the rooms are smoking room. I was really disappointed, because before purchasing this hotel, it stated that there was some non smoking room. When I entered the room, not only very strong smoking smell, but also the bed was so dirty and the toilet also was so dirty. I have not stayed at very bad hotel like this before. So, I did not stay, and I directly checked out, so I lost some money purchasing this one night stay but I was fine. I will never get back to this hotel. So bad service and facility.

Photos that I've uploaded is the things you will have for Junior Suite room and here are some comments of it: 1. You will get 2 pillows, 2 medium towels and shower kit. Sorry for saying this, but the pillow case are smelly. 2. Excellent WiFi connection. 3. There is a spoon and plate inside the cabinet. 4. The room is dusty, specially under the bed, under the table, under sofabed. 5. Hot & Cold water. 6. The bathroom is moldy and there is some hair fall in the drain hole (looks like the old one which is not cleaned) 7. Friendly front table person. 8. I came for check in is right after the rain and there is puddle on the swing that placed in front of the unit I've booked. That's all, thank you.
There is no hot water in shower. Linen and towel was dirty. Some of equipment (hanger) are broken
Nice stay, but in my room, the key hole is kind of rusty and its hard to pull off the key.
affordable, clean and comfy. it's not my 1st time staying in this hotel but I keep coming back because it's so homey. thank you Ariandri.
smaller than expected and smells..but for the budget hotels still okeu
everything was okay but cleanness of the room and toilet they didn't do it properly we stay there 3 day
Gerat price and great room. Great location as well
Good place. Good room. Good vibe.

The staff were friendly and helpful, room was clean & comfy. But unfortunately by night it would be so noisy & super loud because at the 1st floor there ' s some cafe open till midnight. The cafe ' s customer talking & screaming loud until 3AM (I'm at 3rd floor anyway and still can hear everything). I don't know why during ppkm the cafe is still open till 3AM. This hotel also nearby main road, so it would be so stressfull if you choose this hotel for staycation or relaxing. And finally you can sleep by 4AM in the morning. Enjoy! Would definitely not going back to this hotel.
Recommended for millennial people.
The concept was unique, the location was strategic, and the overall stay was satisfying.
Unique new Hotel design, clean and comfortable room. Great location in Jalan Merdeka, so much foodstuffs.. Friendly and helpful staff.. Thank you so much Mas Sony..

The room was ok, conceptnya bagus, tapii jam 12 malam masih ADA sekumpulan manusia main gitar nyanyi2, teriak2 an. Like what. It’s not recommended at all staying here. I feel so regret staying here. Totally not comfortable at all

Plus, I feel like sleeping in a container, AC is okay, TV is okay, mattress and cleanliness is okay. WiFi okay. The minus is that you pay attention, there is no toothbrush, the hot water is closed for a long time, it can't be flashed.
This is my second time stay at Janevalla, the room was clean and very comfortable. The location also strategic, and the food was good. I really recommend this hotel.
Nice place for stay if you at bandung.

Stayed 5 days in this hotel and we enjoyed it very much! They could improve the pillow because it 's too flat, but overall it 's worth the money. You should try a morning walk in the area it 's an absolute delight!
The door unit was broken, lots of stains and holes on bedsheet, the air con didn't cool we had to ask the technician to fix it. The whole room was dirty (the mattress, the bathroom floor, etc).

Beautiful downtown hotel with nice roof top bar! It's clean and has a lot of comfort items to make you feel at home. The atmosphere and service were great. Rooms were very nice and modern. Definitely a must do if you are looking for a good time.

2nd times booking at this best guest house in town, they gave awesome welcome snacks and drink, room spotless clean as usual, friendly staffs, strategic location, always feel like home. Will definitely recommended to friends and family

I surprise at first day because I arrived at 9 PM so the ambience feels spooky. But end up I love the hotel. For the second day I gave to my cousin as my wedding gift and they love it! For sure will coming back again with my family.
The guest house is convniently located and gives homey atmosphere with spacious rooms and nice interior. In addition the service of the staff was superb.

At the beginning I was confused. Because looks like old building. Picture about the hotel not so clear. But ya, never try never know. But then finally I booked hotel. And guess what. I came there it was awesome place to stay I mean in the big city like bandung still have green place to staycation. Its really really comfortable, clean, green, and ya. I meet ibu (owner) in the next morning she is really really friendly and ya we had coffee together in the morning hihi. Coming back again someday. Wait ya hihi
Very clean and comfortable, feels homey.

Exceeded expectation, location + price tag + cleanliness + room size. I stayed for 3 nights when taking care of inlaws hospitalized in St Borromeus which is a 2 mins walk away. The wifi is very good, strong, and stable to support back-to-back zoom meetings with video. The room is super clean and spacious. Staffs can try to smile more, but this is minor compared to the values this guesthouse offer

Spacious, clean, well-maintained little guesthouse. There’s a complimentary snack bar available all day and the kids loved it. Family room is big with two queen beds. Bathroom is clean, hot water runs well. I have to say I’m impressed! At such an affordable rate, we’ll definitely be back.
Spacious room, spotless place, strategic place, worth the money! Definitely will come back. Thank you surya kencana
WiFi wasn't good enough and the table was out of number so I need to wait the others to finish their meals.
Clean & comfortable room, good price & location, helpful & friendly staff.

Hotel is not clean enough, light also not too bright, less maintenamce I think. Some interior are bad condition. Hot water slow response. Bad parking space. Centralized AC is slow cooling. My room has an opening window but the outside noise came inside. Can not go there anymore
Not clear. Staff nice helpfully. Bjt the hotel it 's dirty. Old. The owner maybe don't care the hotel for longtime. It 's dark hotel. Not good for holiday. I honestly complain. Sorry.
The price worth the room. Unfortunately, the room was covered with smoke odor. We hope the hotel can regulate non-smoking rooms for guests wishing to stay in the non-smoking rooms.
Linen bed sheet a lot of spot. Bad towew condition.
I didn't even stay here why am I getting the notification.

We arrived at 3 in the morning after a 10-hour drive, there was no staff to help with luggage. Even the receptionist wasn't wearing a mask. The carpet in the room was stained and dirty. There morning there was little to no air pressure in the bathroom, not even enough to flush the toilet! We were supposed to stay 2 nights, we checked out after the first without being able to take a shower. Again receptionist not wearing a mask. Would NOT recommend this hotel to anyone.

propertyinfo: Deluxe and Simply Studio at Tamansari La Grande Apartment By Travelio

textreviewuser: Always happy to stay in this hotel.
The room is clean and comfy and the staffs were friendly and helpful.

The location is very reacheable. Very nice lobby and all of check-in and check-out process was fast. Spacious bedroom with fresh and clean linen, also clean bathroom. Breakfast menu also various and delicious. Recommendedhotel if you go to Bandung.

YOW. From the check in to the out it was awesome! All the staffs were super friendly, Health protocol was done professionally, The cleanliness, the tools and everything was so perfect. Not to mention they really provide me the room with amazing view! __. And yes, for work from hotel, the wifi the desk the light were so supportive! Would love to stay here again! Thanks!- @ivankur -
Had a wonderful experience! Unfortunately, the services was quite long. Maybe because of the density people staying.
Good room good facility, staff are responsive.

propertyinfo: Deluxe Studio Room @ Tamansari La Grande Apartment

textreviewuser: OK everything is good for family. Please maintains the pool.
Need to queue for check in as we cannot check in earlier than 2 PM. Lobby not so comfy for waiting. Bed not really comfy too.

The hotel has a great location. It have a variety of food nearby. The hotel it self very comfortable with clean room and hot shower. The facility it self its same with the description such as swimming pool. The break fast is fair enough with the price.

The accommodation is as expected. Room was clean when arrived. Sheets and towels were clean. Breakfast was as expected. The location is excellent, close to restaurants, food stalls, minimarkets and ATM. Staff was friendly and helpful.
The location is strategy, the receptionist is welcomed me very nice, hope can back again:).
Staff are not friendly, but near from dipatiukur.
Pleasant stay, good service, clean room and good location __.
the service for this hotel was good, every day they clean the room and fast respond if we need something, friendly employees.. and parking space was enough.. its recommended hotel.
Good location, good price. Good location, good price.
good place to spend quality time with family
nice place for staycation __ thanks
Ok lah for 1 day rest for a while. The bathroom is a little horror but ok xD.
The room is very comfortable especially in the middle of the city~ .
Good almost perfect. It's just that the hot water sometimes disappears when taking a shower.

Strategic location, in the middle of the city, near the bec mall, BIP, Balkot, close to the station, and others. Unfortunately, the only thing lacking is blankets and towels which are usually provided.
The rooms are according to the price, there is hot water too, the environment is also good and close to everywhere. Mr. andi is also kind and friendly, overall good! Thank you.
Very happy, it's strategic to be able to go to the mall, there is an Indomaret under the aprtm, KFC in front of it.

propertyinfo: Deluxe Studio room at La Grande Tamansari Apartment By Travelio

textreviewuser: I will be staying here again. Strategic location, friendly hotel staff, comfortable room. Keep tje good job.

textreviewuser: Service are moderate, hopefully to see it getting improved … But the Room was nice and good point of View, The service at the restaurant needs improvements on the way welcoming the Guest ______.
propertyinfo: Best Western Premier La Grande Hotel

textreviewuser: Menu for breakfast so delicious & the rooms are clean.
propertyinfo: Best Western Premier La Grande Hotel

textreviewuser: The room was worth the price so all was good.
propertyinfo: Best Western Premier La Grande Hotel

textreviewuser: We have quite satisfying experience today in Best Western Premier La Grande Hotel. The location is very strategic, the food is good, the facilities are good. Thank you Mr. Uus for asking our feedback. But unfortunately the spa is still closed and in swimming pool no staff standing by there so we didn't get swimming towel and there are some guest that smoking there, personally it's disturbing for someone who has asthma and baby there.
propertyinfo: Best Western Premier La Grande Hotel

textreviewuser: The warm and semi indoor pool are great, my son really love it. The room are OK with Great View, I took executive room, with bathup. The food were OK. The location were good. But, the bed cover so old, parking staff not nice to us.

textreviewuser: Nice place to stay. But the water heater is so bad.

textreviewuser: The bathroom was dirty, the hot water not wok well.

Linen dirty like it didn't change or washed. Many spot ex liquid in the linen, and hairs around. AC broken. Toilet broken, leak and smell bad. Room smell smoke. Bed smell bad. I just laid a towel on bed and sleep on it. I've got 30k during flash sale and still I decided not to use this facility. I won't stay here even it 's free.
Dirty and dusty.
Cockroach, broken AC, dusty bed, no amenities (but its OK).
ok everything fine. friendly nice location. affordable

It's basically airy room standard but they don’t have soap and tooth brush. they don’t give the plug in for the electricity for us to charging our phone at room, they just have it in the bathroom. sucks! they give us towel while we are just arrive in front of the desk and we bring that up alone to our room
dirty & small running water. dusty and not clean. But considering the rate, what can I say?

I arrived at 4 pm. The staff was actually friendly and helpful but the first time we got a room with an air conditioner not function really good, we felt hot and stuffy. We wait almost 30 minutes to make sure the air conditioner work or not. We ask the staff to change the room, so we got the second room. Overall it is good, but we got another problem the next day precisely in the morning. Water in the bathroom very small, we struggled to take a shower. It really bother us.
Strategic location and have easy access to Gasibu
Good Hotel and nice view with valuable price
Nice clean hotel. Room comfortable.
clean, big, and comfortable room. breakfast was good.

We stayed in family room. Nice ambient. Room was okay. Except the living room carpet looks dull. Breakfast was fine. Parking was adequate. The lift was small and the lift doors required to add more timer to not close so fast. Overall is good and recommended. Will come back again.
good room, clean, and good services
__ feels like home, nearby to the restaurants or cafes, snack are available at the dining table, clean and comfy. Wifi is very good if you work from the hotel __

I stayed with my family here for 3 nights. We booked 1 family room and 1 deluxe king room. We really enjoyed our stay here. Both rooms were clean and spacious. The location's perfect. Will definitely stay here again in the future. Thanks Enreha Guest House :)
Clean room, strategic place, cheap but satisfy. Top Bgt deh __.
Best stayed in bandung, rational price, great location, free food.
This accommodation is so homy, the room is clean and the staff is friendly. Looking forward to stay there in the future when we visit Bandung.
This hotel located in the town near the roadway and has easy parking access. The room was spacious and Comfy. All great review for this hotel is definitely true
Very nice guest house, won't disappoint you
Comfy, spacious, near to to restaurants, cafe. Will be back someday.

The moment I parked my car, there is a generous yet smiley security welcoming us. Pak Gumilar offered help to park which is extra miles __ receptionist are friendly and really nice. The room is spacious yet got a beautiful view. The breakfast was not really satisfactory since I was expecting western food but we are blessed_ overall 9.8/10!
That 's enough for the price. The food also good.
Great place, interior and exterior, even the breakfast menu is new vibe than another places.

One of my favorite hotels when in Bandung. Excellent location near the busy street, lots of eating place, easy to traveling with local public transportation. Very helpful staffs (especially front office and housekeeping). Thank you for changing my room immediately. Nice and clean room with clean linen (unfortunately they can't provide me with soft pillows as I requested), hot water running freely and also wifi. Delicious breakfast with verryy helpful staffs (especially kitchen staffs that help me to get my just one hot hard boiled egg).

I ordered this hotel for my parents because it has a CHS sign and I thought since it 's by Aston it should be clean. However, I heard from my parents that the sheets and bed cover was dirty and the towels were damped when they checked-in. It was sad to hear that because I wanted my parents to have the best stay when they come in but instead it was like that.
The service was nice. Bedroom and bathroom are also clean. Breakfast is great
Good experience to stay, delicious breakfast and friendly staff.

Staffs very friendly, laundry is clean, a lot of food experience around the place, near to the convenience store & ATM, near to Travel Agent, room is clean, bathroom also clean. Definitely will come back again if I visit Bandung.

Very recommended! I stayed 2 nights, the room is very spacious. It has 1 double bed and sofa bed. They provided 4 pillows 2 bolsters and 2 blankets. And also the kitchen equipped with water dispenser, microwave, sink, fridge, and all the kitchen ware. The place is in the city center. You can park your car in basement, and it’s very good in rainy season. For family of 4 it’s perfect!!!

I am actually impressed by the facilities they’re giving. We were arrived in the afternoon and welcomed by a very nice receptionist. I booked a Studio Double Room, they have sink, microwave, mineral water in dispenser, coffee & tea, refrigerator, tv and a couch, (not to forget the comfy bed). And its very spacious for myself alone. The bathroom has a bathtub and separated shower (which is really nice), they provide a shampoo & liquid soap, and also towels. But they do not provide toothbrush and toothpaste, (which is actually okay for me, because I always bring mine) but in case you don’t have it with you, buy one travel toothbrush and toothpaste, it won’t be expensive anway. The location, it is located nearby the ITB University. So do not have to be worry about food, you’ll find plenty around the area. Everything in this place is great. Just a little note that the parking lots is limited, so you might park outside the building on busy days (but it is safe tho, I parked mine outside too at the time). And also if you’re planning to go outside or come back to the hotel / guesthouse a little late, you might need to let the receptionist or the keeper know before you leave. So that you won’t locked outside like I experienced. Long story short, it’s all good with a little notes here and there. Enjoy your stay!

When I first arrived the main door is closed and I just follow to the only open door which is the garage door. Luckily there is someone there to guide me, and as it turned out the guest house is mix with kost-kostan. So yea a little caution for you. As for the room itself, it is great as stated in the photo, I booked for the double room with private bathroom, all is good. The cleannes, freeflow water as they use galon, channel TV, free wifi, microwave, cooking tools, sink, all the things you need are provided. Worth the money I guess, though maybe it could be cheaper as there is no breakfast included. But it's all good. It is also close to lots of restaurants and warungs and ITB of course. Recommended.
Nice experience and hospitality from all the staff
The place is so clean and comfortable.

I arrived at this hotel around 8.30pm, and the receptionist was closed. Kindly hard to find the staffs. The food was standard. Double-studio bedroom is very recommended for you who bring children. The room is clean. There are also many nice resto and food stall around here, if you don't like the breakfast.
There is no bicycle for rent. We have to ask for water, towels and the light globe. But the hotel is nice and we enjoy the stay here.
good ambience for 2 nights stay ! gonna going back for stay more
Feel like at home! Gonna stay there for the second time.
So loud and so much noise came from the bar even during workday night. A place for stay up late hopper.
Friendly staff, unfortunately the sound from nearby cafe is so loud, made me hard to get a nice sleep. Bathroom need some repairs.
No signal, no wifi, dirty towel, no pillow cover __
This is an old hotel - but still a comfortable stay for my experience. Location aspect has become its prioritized selling point. Ah, there is Circle K 24 hours just next door - very helpful ____

Super noisy! You can hear loud music from the bar especially if you stay on 2nd and 3rd floor. It is almost nonstop (they promised it will end by 2.30 am but still they didn't stop until around 3 am). Aren't hotels supposed to be place to sleep?
the room wasn’t clean. there were noises from bar. the bathroom was dirty. the towels were dirty
